    Megatron emerges from the cave that seemed ever so empty now that his 
troops were fleaing one by one. Waspinator stood behinde him at the doors 
slid open and they stepped out to eradicate the pesky Maximal.
    "Waspinator, go and attack from above, I will flank his position. Fire on 
my signal!" He commanded to the insect, already in motion. Megatron pulled 
out his tail gun and was heading to flank the Maximal, but spied the pod and 
the others by it. This was his territory and that was his pod.
    He lept into the air and his thrusters started. He jetted through the sky 
and landed smack down on the pod. "I belive this pod is mine, and 
tresspassing is punishable by death! Turn it over now and leave or die!"

    Aracnia approached Quickstrike. She had a very important mission for him. 
"Quickstrike, Hell Beast's data disks say there is an alien device deep 
within the southwestern jungles, in a trench. Its a good distance away but I 
have to know what it is. Take Venomus and Solo with you. But, I can send 
Grappler, Aerostreak, and Guantix to help you if needed." She said in one 
quick breath.
    
    Tarantulas paced. He was bored out of his insane mind. Anything was 
better than this, even serving Black Aracnia.
    "Atma! Tell Black Aracnia that I'll serve her. I cant take this 
imprisonment any longer!"
